snippet: A former deputy in Pike County who was indicted in an on-duty episode involving a fleeing driver and an off-duty shooting of the former deputy’s neighbor was released after turning himself in, a spokesman for the Ohio attorney general said.
lead_paragraph: A former deputy in Pike County who was indicted in an on-duty episode involving a fleeing driver and an off-duty shooting of the former deputy’s neighbor was released after turning himself in, a spokesman for the Ohio attorney general said.

headline.main: Ex-Sheriff’s Deputy in Ohio, Indicted in 2 Fatal Shootings, Is Released on Bond
headline.print_headline: Ex-Deputy, Held in 2 Shootings, Is Freed on Bond
